languages.text: "Скрытые помещения в глубине дворца. Я никогда не был внутри... к моему счастью. Доверенные слуги, которых губернатор допускает в потайные комнаты... они меняются. Она их меняет. Украшает. Поганит... "

traits.locale_text: "Скрытые помещения в глубине дворца. Я никогда не был внутри... к моему счастью. Доверенные слуги, которых губернатор допускает в потайные комнаты... они меняются. Она их меняет. Украшает. Поганит... " {n}Слуга издает стон и сплевывает кровь.{/n}

languages.text: "Hidden chambers deep within the palace. I've never been inside... thankfully. The servants who are allowed in, the ones the governor trusts... they change. She changes them. Pretties them up. Defiles them."
languages.original_text: "Скрытые помещения в глубине дворца. Я никогда не был внутри... к моему счастью. Доверенные слуги, которых губернатор допускает в потайные комнаты... они меняются. Она их меняет. Украшает. Поганит... "

traits.locale_text: "Hidden chambers deep within the palace. I've never been inside... thankfully. The servants who are allowed in, the ones the governor trusts... they change. She changes them. Pretties them up. Defiles them."

"Hidden chambers deep within the palace. I've never been inside... thankfully. The servants who are allowed in, the ones the governor trusts... they change. She changes them. Pretties them up. Defiles them."

"Hidden chambers deep within the palace. I've never been inside... thankfully. The servants who are allowed in, the ones the governor trusts... they change. She changes them. Pretties them up. Defiles them."

"Hidden chambers deep within the palace. I've never been inside... thankfully. The servants who are allowed in, the ones the governor trusts... they change. She changes them. Pretties them up. Defiles them."

languages.text: 「宮殿の奥深くにある隠し部屋です。中に入ったことはありません…幸運だったのでしょう。入る許可を出された従者、総督の信頼を得ている従者…彼らは変貌します。総督が変えるんです。飾り立てる。それを汚す」
languages.original_text: "Hidden chambers deep within the palace. I've never been inside... thankfully. The servants who are allowed in, the ones the governor trusts... they change. She changes them. Pretties them up. Defiles them."

traits.locale_text: 「宮殿の奥深くにある隠し部屋です。中に入ったことはありません…幸運だったのでしょう。入る許可を出された従者、総督の信頼を得ている従者…彼らは変貌します。総督が変えるんです。飾り立てる。それを汚す」

languages.text: “是宫殿深处的密室。帝皇保佑，我从来没进去过……那些能进去的人都是总督的亲信……他们的样子全都变了。是她改变了他们，扭曲了他们，玷污了他们。”
languages.original_text: "Hidden chambers deep within the palace. I've never been inside... thankfully. The servants who are allowed in, the ones the governor trusts... they change. She changes them. Pretties them up. Defiles them."

traits.locale_text: “是宫殿深处的密室。帝皇保佑，我从来没进去过……那些能进去的人都是总督的亲信……他们的样子全都变了。是她改变了他们，扭曲了他们，玷污了他们。”

languages.text: «Cámaras ocultas en las profundidades del palacio. Nunca he estado en ellas... por suerte. Los sirvientes que pueden pasar, en los que confía la gobernadora... cambian. Hace que cambien. Los embellece. Los profana».
languages.original_text: "Hidden chambers deep within the palace. I've never been inside... thankfully. The servants who are allowed in, the ones the governor trusts... they change. She changes them. Pretties them up. Defiles them."

traits.locale_text: «Cámaras ocultas en las profundidades del palacio. Nunca he estado en ellas... por suerte. Los sirvientes que pueden pasar, en los que confía la gobernadora... cambian. Hace que cambien. Los embellece. Los profana».

languages.text: "Versteckte Kammern tief im Palast. Ich war noch nie drin ... zum Glück. Die Diener, die Zugang haben, denen die Gouverneurin vertraut ... sie verändern sich. Sie verändert sie. Macht sie hübscher. Schändet sie."
languages.original_text: "Hidden chambers deep within the palace. I've never been inside... thankfully. The servants who are allowed in, the ones the governor trusts... they change. She changes them. Pretties them up. Defiles them."

traits.locale_text: "Versteckte Kammern tief im Palast. Ich war noch nie drin ... zum Glück. Die Diener, die Zugang haben, denen die Gouverneurin vertraut ... sie verändern sich. Sie verändert sie. Macht sie hübscher. Schändet sie."

languages.text: « Des salles cachées au cœur du palais. Je n'y ai jamais mis les pieds... heureusement pour moi. Les serviteurs qui y ont accès, ceux qui ont la confiance de la gouverneure, ils... changent. Elle les change, les maquille... Elle les souille. »
languages.original_text: "Hidden chambers deep within the palace. I've never been inside... thankfully. The servants who are allowed in, the ones the governor trusts... they change. She changes them. Pretties them up. Defiles them."

traits.locale_text: « Des salles cachées au cœur du palais. Je n'y ai jamais mis les pieds... heureusement pour moi. Les serviteurs qui y ont accès, ceux qui ont la confiance de la gouverneure, ils... changent. Elle les change, les maquille... Elle les souille. »

languages.text: "Sarayın derinliklerine gizlenmiş odalar. Şükürler olsun ki hiç girmedim. Sadece valinin güvendiği hizmetkârların giriş izni vardı ve onlar da... Değişiyordu. Vali onları değiştiriyordu. Güzelleştiriyordu. Bozuyordu."
languages.original_text: "Hidden chambers deep within the palace. I've never been inside... thankfully. The servants who are allowed in, the ones the governor trusts... they change. She changes them. Pretties them up. Defiles them."

traits.locale_text: "Sarayın derinliklerine gizlenmiş odalar. Şükürler olsun ki hiç girmedim. Sadece valinin güvendiği hizmetkârların giriş izni vardı ve onlar da... Değişiyordu. Vali onları değiştiriyordu. Güzelleştiriyordu. Bozuyordu."
